title: Molecules average vertical component of velocity

content.question: An ideal gas with molecules of mass m is contained in a cube with sides of area A. The pressure exerted by the gas on the top of the cube is P, and N molecules hit the top of the cube in a time ∆t. What is the average vertical component of the velocity of the gas molecules?
